cont.entity_a: The lens performs well in most light conditions and is the only lens carried on trips.
cont.entity_b: Fantastic macro lens with sharp images.

cont.entity_a: It is bulky and catches attention.
cont.entity_b: Heavy and difficult to use handheld due to lack of stabilization.

cont.entity_a: Pictures taken with the lens are magical with no need for post-processing. Stunning image quality with clarity and color. Amazing image clarity compared to non-L lenses. Sharp images with no noticeable fall off on edges. Super sharp and great color contrast.
cont.entity_b: Super sharp and captures great close-up portraits. Extreme good quality and super sharp photos. Provides excellent clarity and background blur. Sharpness, saturation, color accuracy, and contrast are excellent.

cont.entity_a: The lens is pricey but considered worth it.
Concerns about packaging and lack of instructions or warranty sheet.
Photos are out of focus with this lens compared to other Canon lenses. Fast autofocus and f/2.8 is useful in low light. The lens is clear and quick to focus.
cont.entity_b: Focus hunts a bit at close range on non-contrasty subjects. Manual focus recommended for macro photography. Focusing is slow, but manual focus is preferred for macro. Heavy and slow focusing.

cont.entity_a: Wide angle and optics are amazing. No visible vignetting or distortion. Great for wide-angle shots without fisheye effect. Great for capturing wide shots with minimal distortion.
Flexible focal length range of 16-35mm is useful.
cont.entity_b: Allows distance from subject to avoid shadows. Allows shooting from a distance.

cont.entity_a: Compromise on sharpness is worth the zoom range. Sharp in low light and suitable for real estate photography.
cont.entity_b: Sharpness, saturation, color accuracy, and contrast are excellent.

Build Quality.comm: Great quality expected from Canon L series.

cont.entity_a: Build quality is great with Canon L series.
cont.entity_b: Solid build quality and great results.

cont.entity_a: Perfect for landscapes and night photography. Excellent for landscape and low light photography.
cont.entity_b: Ideal for macro photography with less need to be close to the subject.

cont.entity_a: Excellent performance with Canon full-frame sensor cameras.

cont.entity_b: No image stabilization makes handheld macro shots difficult.
